physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mild tenderness of medial joint line of left knee. Faint inspiratory rales in left lower lung field. Faint inspiratory wheezing in upper lung fields bilaterally.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient was afebrile and tachycardia resolved; there was improvement in respiratory status with adequate air movement noted.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Soft, non-tender, non-distended abdomen with present bowel sounds. No organomegaly. No rebound or guarding. No CVA tenderness to percussion.
Alert, oriented, in no acute distress. CN II-XII intact. No clubbing, cyanosis, or edema in extremities.
